name: Pad Thai
description: Classic stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and tamarind sauce

name: Tom Yum Goong
description: Spicy and sour soup with fresh shrimp, lemongrass, and lime leaves

name: Green Curry Chicken
description: Aromatic green curry with tender chicken, Thai basil, and coconut milk

name: Khao Pad (Fried Rice)
description: Fragrant jasmine rice stir-fried with vegetables, egg, and your choice of protein

name: Som Tam (Papaya Salad)
description: Fresh papaya salad with tomatoes, green beans, and spicy lime dressing

name: Mango Sticky Rice
description: Sweet sticky rice topped with fresh mango slices and coconut cream

name: Massaman Curry
description: Rich and mild curry with beef, potatoes, and roasted peanuts

name: Pad Krapow Moo Saap
description: Spicy stir-fried minced pork with Thai basil served over rice with fried egg

name: Coconut Ice Cream
description: Creamy coconut ice cream served with toasted coconut flakes and peanuts

name: Pad See Ew
description: Wide rice noodles stir-fried with dark soy sauce, Chinese broccoli, and egg

name: Tom Kha Gai
description: Creamy coconut chicken soup with galangal, lime leaves, and mushrooms
